tool.name: Reformat PSM file as CPTAC mzid.
tool.command: export TMPDIR=`pwd` && ln -s ${spectra} ${spectra.name} && ln -s ${input} ${input.name} && python ${__tool_directory__}/fixseqdb.py ${__tool_directory__}/${advanced.seqconfig} ${__tool_data_path__} > seqdb.ini && #if $seqdb == 'human' SEQDB="RefSeq:Human,UniProt:Human" && #else if $seqdb == 'mouse' SEQDB="RefSeq:Mouse,UniProt:Mouse" && #else if $seqdb == 'rat' SEQDB="RefSeq:Rat,UniProt:Rat" && #else if $seqdb == 'xenograft' SEQDB="RefSeq:Human,UniProt:Human,RefSeq:Mouse,UniProt:Mouse" && #end if ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/cptacdcc/psmextract --seqdb "\$SEQDB" --seqdir . --format ${parser} ${input.name} | ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/cptacdcc/textpsm2mzid 2>&1 | fgrep -v HexN | gzip -9 -c > ${output}
